name: Extreme Home Takover
description:
You just moved in to a humble home with four walls and nothing more. Every day present you with an event of sorts which require different things like food, drinks, somewhere to sit, etc. The event won't be very successful without them so try to gather enough before the day runs out and the event starts. 

Maybe your wealthy neighbors won't mind if you "borrow" some while they're out and about...

Note: some things must be picked up with both hands.
